name: Music Concert
description: An electrifying night with live performances from top bands and artists. Enjoy music, food, and fun.
tickets: Available online and at the venue.

name: Art Exhibition
description: An exclusive display of contemporary art pieces from renowned artists around the world.

name: Food Festival
description: Taste culinary delights from various cultures. A paradise for food lovers with live cooking demos and tasting sessions.

name: Tech Conference
description: A conference for tech enthusiasts featuring keynote speeches from industry leaders, workshops, and networking opportunities.
tickets: Register online for early bird pricing.

name: Marathon
description: Join runners from around the world in this annual marathon event. Open to all fitness levels.

name: Film Festival
description: A celebration of independent films from various genres. Meet filmmakers, attend screenings, and enjoy panel discussions.

name: Book Fair
description: A paradise for book lovers with stalls from publishers, author signings, and literary discussions.

name: Fashion Show
description: A showcase of the latest fashion trends featuring top designers and models on the runway.

name: Cultural Festival
description: Experience the rich cultural heritage of India through music, dance, and art displays from various states.
